topics.body:
I know most people probably don't care, but I'm excited for stuff going on in my life:
I'm officially a student at my online college.
So far everything is fine.

My body hair has slowed down a lot.  The main thing that was preventing me from transitioning was I was hairy.  I should be able to full time in a year and pass.  My goal is to take care of all the big things one at a time and first cause they're so time intensive that by the time I've done all them it'll be a cakewalk.

Essentially: school is good and I should be able to full time trap in less than a year.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
